Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Kho nitsimbabaasi shina tsia Nyasaye wenyu tsiamukhayanga
Mukari omo balimwo abakhasi abalayi abawulili
Kho nitsimbabaasi shina tsia Nyasaye wenyu tsiamukhayanga
Abakhasi abalayi betsimoni tsikhongo balarulanga munzu
Kho nitsimbabaasi shina tsia Nyasaye wenyu tsiamukhayanga
Kho nitsimbabaasi shina tsia Nyasaye wenyu tsiamukhayanga
Baliyekha khubifumbi biruundanga bioluyali biobukondo bwamasafu nende emikeka chianabwa obulayi
Kho nitsimbabaasi shina tsia Nyasaye wenyu tsiamukhayanga
lihebwe oluyali elira lia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi Woluyali nende Obwani
Abandu bomukhono omulunji, koo ni babu wina abo Abandu bomukhono omulunji
Ne Abandu bomukhono omukaata, koo nibabu wina abo bomukhono omukaata
